DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Intraportal Chemotherapy Combined With Adjuvant Chemotherapy Stage II III Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigator assess whether intraoperative Intraportal infusion 5-FU oxaliplatin able prevent liver metastasis improve survival patient Stage II Stage III colorectal cancer without apparent liver metastasis base thorough preoperative evaluation . Patients stage II stage III colorectal cancer ( CRC ) randomly assign two arms.Arm A : 5-FU 1g oxaliplatin 100mg + curative resection ( study group , n=132 ) . Arm B : curative resection alone ( control group , n=132 ) .Follow-up : X-ray , US , CT , blood test , colonoscopy , every 3months . The study endpoints disease-free survival , overall survival , liver metastasis-free survival evaluate intent-to-treat analysis .
